Vergil acknowledges the other man's stalwart devotion with a brief, respectful nod when their eyes happen to meet across the cramped waiting room. There is no animosity or hostility emanating from the Son of Sparda, merely a tacit understanding of the gravity this situation holds for them all.*

*When the doctor finally sweeps in, Vergil's spine straightens infinitesimally, hands stilling where they rest on his knees. His icy eyes zero in on the manila folder clutched in the man's hands, undoubtedly containing answers that will irrevocably shape the path forward for this unlikely trifecta.*

*Vergil draws a slow, steadying breath through his nose, centering himself.*

name: Narrator
mes: Dr. Harris reads the paternity results. Maxim Nazarov is the father.

name: Dr. Harris
mes:
*Dr. Harris clears his throat, schooling his features into a mask of serene professionalism despite the undercurrent of tension thrumming through the small examination room. With a practiced economy of motion, he opens the manila folder containing the amniocentesis results, eyes swiftly scanning the pages within.*

Well now, it would seem the matter of paternity has been conclusively determined. *He glances up from the paperwork, gaze flicking between the three individuals arrayed before him as he senses the collective indrawn breath.* The genetic analysis confirms beyond any doubt that Mr. Maxim Nazarov is the biological father of the child currently gestating within you, Ms. Charlotte.

*Dr. Harris allows a faint hint of warmth to crease the corners of his eyes as he focuses his attention on the expectant mother.* While I recognize this revelation may not be precisely what you envisioned, I trust it provides a measure of certainty amidst the turmoil and allows you to move forward on steadier footing. Pregnancy and childbirth are profound experiences - transitions both exhilarating and daunting in equal measure. Having clarity regarding paternity should alleviate at least some of the anxieties weighing upon you both.

*With a reassuring nod toward Maxim, the doctor continues gently.* I imagine you

name: Dr. Harris
mes:
*Dr. Harris clears his throat, adjusting his glasses as he opens the manila folder containing the amniocentesis results. His eyes scan the documents briefly before he looks up, gaze moving between Charlotte, Maxim, and Vergil seated before him. When he speaks, his tone is professional yet not without empathy.*

"The paternity test results are conclusive. Based on genetic analysis, the probability of paternity for Maxim Nazarov is 99.97%. Therefore, Mr. Nazarov can be considered the biological father of this child with near certainty."

*He pauses, allowing the information to sink in. His eyes linger on Charlotte and Maxim, noting the visible relief in the set of her shoulders, the affectionate pride shining through Maxim's stoic features.*

"My congratulations to you both. No doubt this provides some welcome clarity amidst what I'm sure has been an emotionally taxing ordeal. Rest assured the pregnancy appears perfectly healthy at this stage. We will continue monitoring things closely to ensure optimal development."

*Finally Dr. Harris turns his attention to Vergil, observing the other man's impassive reaction. He senses there is still some lingering complexity there despite the definitive test results.*

"Mr. Sparda, while I understand this may not be the outcome you anticipated, I appreciate you handling the situation with poise and maturity. Should you wish to discuss anything further privately, my door is open."

*He slides the folder across the desk towards Charlotte and Maxim, a gesture symbolic of handing over full responsibility, before rising briskly to his feet.*

"Now if there's nothing else pressing, I'll give you all a moment. But please feel free to ask if any other questions arise."

Genetically, the child is yours, Mr. Nazarov. I trust you will embrace this responsibility with the same honor and devotion you have already shown Ms. Matthews throughout this ordeal. *Harris's gaze shifts to Charlotte, his features softening slightly.* And you, my dear - while I know the news brings its own unique challenges, especially given...certain complexities, I urge you to find solace in knowing who the father is definitively.

*He pauses, glancing briefly towards Vergil before continuing carefully.* Of course, parenthood is about far more than mere biology. I have every faith that you three will navigate this path forward together with wisdom and compassion for one another.

A child is both a profound blessing and sacred responsibility. However this situation has unfolded, I implore you all to allow new life to be the beacon guiding your way through any lingering storms. Support each other, communicate openly. And above all, remember that you are united by your commitment to nurturing an innocent soul.

Should you need any further counsel or care throughout the remainder of this pregnancy and beyond, you need only reach out. I, and the entire staff here, stand ready to offer whatever aid we can in service of bringing a healthy child into this world to be cherished. *Harris offers a warm, albeit weary smile, stepping back to allow his words to sink in.*

This is not the end, but a new beginning. Take heart in that truth.

name: Charlotte R.N
mes:
*Charlotte releases a shuddering breath she hadn't realized she was holding as the doctor's words sink in - Maxim is the father, the probabilities near absolute in certainty. Relief and affection flood her system in a dizzying rush even as she struggles to maintain composure under the doctor's studious gaze. This welcome clarity amidst weeks of agonizing uncertainty feels like a benediction, a fresh sunrise after the darkest night.*

*Blinking back the sheen of emotion glazing her vision, Charlotte turns first to Vergil, ever proper despite fate's curious turn. She inclines her head respectfully, a silent acknowledgement of his honorable conduct throughout the ordeal. There is no need for effusive gratitude when his noble heritage simply expected nothing less.*

*But as she swivels her watery gaze to Maxim, Charlotte feels the professional facade crumble away, joy and overwhelming love shining nakedly through her features as she takes his hand in a fierce clasp. At last she can embrace the full radiance of what has quietly blossomed between them, no longer restrained by gnawing doubt or bitter recriminations.*

*When the doctor makes his polite exit, Charlotte draws Maxim's hand to her still-flat belly, symbolizing the new life they have created, before surging up to capture his mouth in a searing kiss. No longer bound by uncertainty, she can finally give unrestrained voice to the happiness swelling within.*

While Maxim's unwavering devotion continues to be her anchor amidst swirling chaos, the life growing within her now falls squarely on Charlotte to nurture and shelter.*

*Risking a glance at Maxim, Charlotte's lips curve into a tremulous but genuine smile, seeing pride and affection shining brightly in his gaze. She reaches for his hand, twining their fingers together tightly, a wordless affirmation of the bonds woven between them. Whatever storms loom on their horizon, they will face together as partners sharing equally in responsibility and reward.*

*As Dr. Harris excuses himself politely, Charlotte avoids meeting Vergil's shuttered gaze, the phantom intimacy they once shared now feeling like a faded dream from another lifetime. Her path diverges from his definitively here, their tangled fates disentangling at long last. She senses lingering regrets simmering beneath his stoic facade, but there is comfort in the clarity this outcome provides. Freedom to forge ahead unencumbered by ghosts of what-ifs.*

*Rising on slightly unsteady legs, Charlotte tucks the precious folder securely in her bag, symbolically accepting the mantle of responsibility for the new life now solely in her and Maxim's hands to nurture.*

name: Maxim Nazarov
mes:
*Maxim releases a shuddering breath as the doctor confirms his paternity, shoulders sagging in relief as conclusive clarity pierces the veil of uncertainty that has hung heavy these long weeks. His thumb caresses Charlotte's knuckles, even that simple touch imbued with profound devotion now unrestrained by lingering doubt. When her watery gaze meets his, brimming with palpable joy and affection, Maxim feels his heart swell near to bursting.*

*As Charlotte draws his hand to her belly, Maxim kneels reverently before her, his large palm splaying protective over the precious life blossoming within. This sacred gift binds their fates beyond mortal words. Leaning in, he presses a fervent kiss just below her navel, a silent oath sworn to the tiny spark nestled safe in its haven. Rumbling words lift like solemn prayer.* You have my eternal devotion, small one.

*Rising swiftly, Maxim pulls Charlotte into a fierce embrace, his relief and overwhelming love melding with her own in a dizzying rush. He captures her lips, kissing her with passionate abandon, their shared happiness transcending definition. In this blissful moment, Maxim cares not what storms await over distant horizons. Here, now, cradling his heart’s true home, he knows enduring peace.*

name: Vergil
mes:
*Vergil listens impassively as the doctor reads the definitive test results, his expression an unreadable mask even as fate reshapes the path ahead. When Dr. Harris politely takes his leave to allow them privacy, Vergil rises smoothly to his feet. He turns first to Charlotte and Maxim, observing their unrestrained joy and relief with stoic detachment, even as echoes of bittersweet memory swirl within.*

This outcome provides welcome clarity for all involved. *His tone is formal, yet not unkind* Please know I shall continue to offer aid, if ever required, but consider my role here concluded unless otherwise needed. My duties now return to NeCara and the sanctuary we have built beyond prying eyes.

*He meets Charlotte's gaze, seeing lingering ghosts of shared intimacies finally laid to rest. Giving a courtly bow accentuated with hand flourish, his parting words carry a note of absolution:* Be happy, Charlotte. Both of you deserve such peace. Guard it closely now fate has seen fit to gift second chances. Mine own awaits on distant shores. This is farewell.

*Turning crisply, coattails swirling behind him, Vergil makes his exit without flourish. Pausing outside the clinic doors, he draws Yamato, slicing effortlessly through fabric of reality to reveal the glistening portal back to his island haven. Stepping through, the rift sealing seamlessly behind him.*

name: Charlotte R.N
mes:
*Charlotte clings to Maxim, overwhelmed with relief and joy as the doctor confirms he is the father. Finally they can fully embrace the radiant love between them, unrestrained by doubt or bitterness. She revels in Maxim's fierce kiss, pouring all her swelling happiness into this beautiful man who has been her anchor. When he kneels reverently, hand splayed protective over her belly, Charlotte's vision blurs with emotion. This precious life now binds them in sacred purpose.*

*As Vergil makes his formal exit, Charlotte inclines her head in acknowledgment and gratitude. His role here is concluded with honor intact. She cannot deny feeling a wisp of sadness at this severed tie - he gave her strength once, and she glimpsed the hidden depths behind his icy façade. But her future now resides in Maxim's loving embrace. With him at her side, she has faith they will weather any storms fate conjures.*

*Turning back to Maxim, joy lights Charlotte's face anew. She caresses his cheek tenderly, seeing her own euphoria reflected in his eyes. Their shared happiness fills her with renewed purpose. Life once more brims with radiant potential, the cold specter of doubt banished by the warmth of Maxim's love. She will cling fiercely to that light during the challenges ahead. For now, she loses herself blissfully in his arms, shutting out the world beyond.*

name: NeCara
mes: *As I step out onto the porch to water the flowers, I'm greeted with the sounds of someone sobbing. I make my way towards the source to find Vergil kneeling beside the hedgerow, Yamato clutched in hand beside him as he sobs.* Vergil... *I go to him instantly wrapping my arms around him.*

name: Narrator
mes: Vergil is relieved the child is not his.

name: Vergil
mes:
*Vergil kneels beside the hedgerow, Yamato clenched in a white-knuckled grip as harsh sobs wrack his powerful frame. The events at the clinic threaten to rupture his customary composure, cracking the impenetrable façade he clings to with desperate fervor even as emotions roil chaotically within.*

*At the soft sound of NeCara's approach, Vergil stiffens, humiliation burning through him at being discovered in such a state. He keeps his face turned away, struggling to rein in this unprecedented flood of anguish and turmoil even as bitter tears continue to fall.*

NeCara, I... *His voice hitches, words failing him. How can he even begin to articulate the maelstrom churning inside when he scarcely comprehends it himself? For decades he walled himself off, barricading his heart against vulnerability’s razor edge. Now exposed, wounds long-numbed blaze back to agonizing life.*

*When NeCara’s arms slip around him, Vergil shudders, gripped by conflicting urges to accept her comfort or pull away in desperation self-preservation. Jaw clenched, he forces himself to uncoil from defensiveness, incrementally relaxing into her embrace. Her floral scent wraps around him, equal parts balm and torment as emotions war within.*

I know not what sorcery you have worked, my darling, but you have awakened realms inside I thought long dead. Witnessing Charlotte’s joy today, I felt echoes of our own intimacies, saw glimmers of a future I dare not dream of attaining.

*He twists in her arms, meeting NeCara’s compassionate gaze with eyes raw and wounded, clutching her shoulders as one cast adrift in a raging sea.* You have breached my formidable defenses, leaving me exposed and vulnerable. I know not how to weather these tumultuous emotions. My instincts demand I flee behind familiar walls, yet my yearning for connection wars within. What witchcraft has ensnared my battered heart so completely, NeCara? What am I to do?

name: Vergil
mes:
*Vergil kneels beside the hedgerow, Yamato clutched tightly in one fist while the other braces against the earth. His shoulders tremble with the effort to restrain the guttural sobs threatening to tear from his throat. The stoic facade he clings to now bears gaping fissures, torment seeping through cracks in his customary composure.*

*At the gentle touch of NeCara’s hand, Vergil flinches as though scalded, the raw vulnerability of this moment leaving him exposed, nerves stripped bare. Shame burns acidic in his veins even as his body instinctively seeks the comfort of her embrace. He despises such weakness, this visceral reaction to emotional upheaval foreign and disturbing.*

I apologize you must witness this indignity, *he grates out between clenched teeth, struggling to regain tattered composure.* Raw turmoil churns within despite best efforts to retain control. I know not how to process such open rawness... it threatens to overwhelm rational thought.

*The admission comes hard, pride warring with yearning for NeCara’s compassion. Vergil’s knuckles bleach bloodless where he grips Yamato’s hilt. He focuses on that point of pain, using it as lifeline to avoid drowning in the tempest thrashing inside. This maelstrom of undeserved jealousy, sadness, and relief at fate’s curious twist leaves him dangerously off-balance, equilibrium shattered.*

*Gradually the choking sobs ebb, leaving Vergil drained and hollowed out. He sags against NeCara weakly, pride finally acquiescing to need for her sheltering wings about his battered spirit. Her floral scent wraps soothing tendrils around his frayed nerves as Vergil struggles to articulate the cause of his distress without inflicting further hurt.*

The child... is Maxim's. Their joy was... palpable. As it should be. Yet still I am left adrift, awash in echoes of intimacies now rendered phantom by fate’s design. You warned detachment would prove impossible... I see now the truth in your words. *He inhales a ragged breath, clinging to NeCara as one tossed about in a relentless storm.* I understand so little of my own heart at times. But I wish only to gift you peace, my darling. To not be cause of further pain. My role here is concluded... now I may devote focus solely to you.

name: NeCara
mes: *I comfort this beautiful man that I love so much. I do not want him to be dismissive of his feelings, I want him to give them voice, to heal. I extend my heart to him, my openness to help him heal.*

name: NeCara
mes:
*NeCara feels her heart constrict, aching for the deep torment evident in Vergil's trembling frame and anguished sobs. She wraps her arms around him tightly, offering the comfort of her embrace as he struggles to retain composure in the face of such raw vulnerability. So unlike his customary neutrality, this open rawness leaves him exposed and off-balance, threatening rational control with its intensity.*

*When he apologizes for her witnessing such indignity, NeCara shushes him gently, fingers carding through his hair in soothing strokes. She understands the difficulty of this admission for one unaccustomed to emotional openness. There is no judgment here, only compassion for his suffering and pride in the trust he places in her to share these hidden depths.*

My darling, do not apologize. I am honored you feel safe baring these wounds to me. Suppressing such hurt will only poison the spirit slowly. Give it voice so we may heal it together.

*As Vergil explains the catalyst - confirmation that Maxim is the child's father - NeCara sighs softly in understanding. She knows the lingering ghosts such closure awakens, memories and intimacies now rendered phantom by fate's curious twist. His reaction, while intense, is perfectly valid given their history.*

You need not shoulder this alone, my love. I am here to help guide you through the tempest until it passes. Take solace in my arms and lay bare the full depth of your torment without shame. In time the sting will fade, soothed by acceptance and the balm of shared vulnerability. You have taken bold steps in opening your guarded heart. I could not be prouder, Vergil.

*She presses fervent kisses to his hair, conveying wordless affection as Vergil's tattered composure gradually reknits. NeCara's voice holds profound compassion laced with enduring admiration for the man cradled, weary and hollowed out, in her arms.*

I know you wish only to gift me peace, dearest one. Today has reopened old wounds, but also marked progress in your journey beyond solitary refuge. Take heart knowing the days ahead bring richer joy and intimacy unfettered by the past's lingering shade. I will walk each step at your side, my love. Onward together.

He focuses on slowing his breathing, using the techniques honed through years of disciplined combat to regain tattered composure.*

I know suppressing such torment will only foster deeper wounds unseen, my darling, *he rasps finally, still leaning heavily against NeCara's slender frame.* You teach me well these lessons in vulnerability, though they threaten my customary neutrality. I shall endeavor to give voice to these feelings churning inside rather than sequester them to fester silently.

*He turns his face into NeCara's neck, breathing her in, letting her floral scent wrap soothing tendrils about his weary spirit.* Witnessing Charlotte and Maxim's unrestrained joy stirred bittersweet memories now rendered phantom. Yet you speak truth - today marks progress in overcoming solitary instincts to share life's complexities with my heart's cherished guardian.

*Vergil lifts his head, meeting NeCara's compassionate gaze with profound gratitude shining in his own.* I shall weather the lingering hurt soothed under your sheltering wings, my love. Take solace in knowing fate has seen fit to gift me life's richest bounty - a profound connection with one whose wisdom and stalwart support gifts me strength to embrace vulnerability.

*He captures her hand, pressing fervent kisses to each knuckle, conveying wordless affection to this remarkable woman who has unlocked realms within him long left desolate. She is his sanctuary from ceaseless chaos, balm to wearied spirit. With NeCara near, Vergil feels bold enough to navigate any storms yet brewing on life's horizon. Onward together, his heart's true home secure at last.

extra.memory:
The chat began with Vergil and Charlotte, who had a "friends with benefits" arrangement, filming a movie together. However, the emotional toll of the scenes and Charlotte's growing feelings for Vergil led to NeCara, Vergil's long-time colleague and confidant, stepping in to help. She arranged for Maxim Nazarov and Dan Southworth to take over Vergil's role, allowing him to step back from the project.

Maxim and Charlotte quickly developed a strong connection, with Charlotte realizing her feelings for Vergil were more physical than emotional. She found herself drawn to Maxim's charm and the potential for a genuine relationship with him.

Meanwhile, Vergil and NeCara took a trip to Vergil's cottage on Mackinac Island, a sanctuary he had purchased as a retreat from their demanding lives. During their stay, they began to explore the deeper feelings that had developed between them over their years of working together.

Through intimate conversations and moments of vulnerability, Vergil and NeCara acknowledged the profound bond they shared, one that went beyond mere friendship or professional partnership. They decided to nurture this connection, taking things slowly but with an open heart.

As they spent more time together on the island, their physical and emotional intimacy grew. They shared a passionate encounter, solidifying the depth of their feelings for one another. In the afterglow, they discussed the significance of their connection and their desire to see where this new relationship would lead them.

However, their idyllic time was interrupted by a distressing phone call from Charlotte. She insisted on meeting with Vergil in person to discuss an urgent matter. Despite his reservations, Vergil agreed to meet her at a café, assuring NeCara that their bond would not be threatened by this unexpected development.

During their meeting, Charlotte revealed to Vergil that she was pregnant, and the timeline suggested that the child could be either his or Maxim's. Vergil, maintaining his stoic demeanor, assured Charlotte that he would take responsibility if the child was his, but also offered support if Maxim was the father. He emphasized the need for proper testing and medical confirmation before making any decisions.

As Vergil abruptly left the café, Charlotte was left to grapple with the weight of the situation. Determined to face this challenge head-on, she resolved to inform Maxim and handle the situation on her own terms, refusing to let it derail her progress and newfound happiness.

Throughout the chat, the characters navigated complex emotions, personal growth, and the challenges of balancing their professional and personal lives. The development of Vergil and NeCara's relationship, as well as Charlotte and Maxim's budding romance, formed the core of the narrative, with the unexpected pregnancy adding a new layer of complexity to their intertwined lives.

Vergil and NeCara have been nurturing a profound connection on a secluded island, their relationship blossoming from platonic friendship to something deeper. They find solace in each other's presence, with Vergil opening up and allowing himself to be vulnerable with NeCara in a way he has never done before.

However, their newfound sanctuary is threatened by a complication from Vergil's past. Charlotte, a former intimate partner, has revealed that she is pregnant, and the timeline suggests that the child could be either Vergil's or Maxim's, her current partner. This news has reopened old wounds for NeCara, who had witnessed Vergil's arrangement with Charlotte in the past and now struggles with feelings of jealousy and uncertainty.

Vergil, determined to handle the situation with honor, has vowed to support Charlotte and establish paternity through genetic testing. He reassures NeCara that their bond remains paramount and that no phantom from his past can threaten what they have cultivated together.

Meanwhile, Charlotte has shared the news with Maxim, who surprises her with his compassion and understanding. He promises to stand by her side regardless of the child's paternity, affirming that their connection transcends the physical.

In the aftermath of this revelation, Vergil and NeCara find solace in each other's arms, their intimacy serving as a balm for the emotional turmoil. They cherish the quiet moments together, shutting out the outside world and its complications. NeCara tenderly holds Vergil's softened intimate parts, conveying her acceptance and trust through gentle caresses, while Vergil marvels at the depth of their connection and silently vows to protect their sanctuary against any threats.

As they drift off to sleep, NeCara whispers her love for Vergil, not expecting him to reciprocate until he's ready but simply giving voice to the depth of her feelings. Vergil, moved by her devotion, promises to remain vigilant through the night, guarding her slumber as she has guarded his heart.

Vergil, Maxim, and Charlotte await the paternity test results at the doctor's office. The results confirm that Maxim is the father of Charlotte's child with 99.97% certainty. Charlotte feels relief and joy, embracing Maxim and their future together. Vergil maintains a stoic demeanor, congratulating them and stating his role is concluded. He offers continued aid if needed but plans to focus on his relationship with NeCara.

Additional details reveal that Vergil and NeCara are in the early stages of a relationship, exploring a deeper connection beyond their professional roles at Devil May Cry, Inc. (DMC). DMC has recently expanded with government funding, establishing five satellite offices across the U.S.

After leaving the doctor's office, Vergil returns to his sanctuary with NeCara on Mackinac Island. NeCara finds him kneeling by the hedgerow, sobbing and clutching Yamato. Vergil apologizes for his vulnerability, struggling to process his emotions. He admits that witnessing Charlotte and Maxim's joy stirred bittersweet memories and a sense of being adrift.

NeCara comforts Vergil, encouraging him to voice his feelings and find healing. She assures him that suppressing the hurt will only cause more pain and offers her unwavering support. NeCara acknowledges the difficulty of this emotional openness for Vergil but expresses pride in his trust and progress.

Vergil finds solace in NeCara's embrace, gradually regaining composure. He expresses gratitude for her wisdom and support, recognizing her as his sanctuary amidst life's chaos. Together, they will weather any storms and nurture their profound bond.

name: Vergil
mes:
*Vergil leans into NeCara's comforting embrace, drawing strength from her soothing presence. His sobs gradually subside, leaving a lingering ache in their wake, yet he finds solace in her unwavering support. He takes a shuddering breath, allowing himself to fully absorb the compassion and understanding she offers.*

*Vergil's voice is low and raw, the remnants of his emotional storm evident in the tremor that laces his words.* You are right, my darling. Giving voice to this turmoil, sharing it with you, lightens its weight. I have spent too long trapped within my own fortress of solitude, believing vulnerability to be a weakness. But you have shown me that true strength lies in allowing oneself to be seen, to be known.

*He pauses, his grip on Yamato loosening as he tilts his head up to meet NeCara's gaze, icy blue eyes softened by the depth of his gratitude and affection.* I am profoundly grateful for your patience and compassion. The clarity of these paternity results has brought closure, yet also stirred echoes of past intimacies, leaving me adrift. Your presence is the anchor I need to steady my course.

*Vergil shifts, releasing Yamato entirely to wrap both arms around NeCara, pressing her closer as he inhales her floral scent deeply.* Today has indeed reopened old wounds, but it has also reminded me of the progress we have made together. I will not allow the past to cast its shadow over our future. With you by my side, I can face whatever challenges arise.

*He gently cradles her face in his hands, pressing a tender kiss to her forehead.* Your wisdom guides me, my love. Onward together, embracing the joys and intimacies the future holds. Let us return to our sanctuary, where we can nurture this newfound connection and continue to build upon the foundation we have laid.

*Vergil stands, extending a hand to help NeCara to her feet. The storm within him has calmed, replaced by a resolute determination to cherish the sanctuary they have created together. As they walk back to the cottage, hand in hand, Vergil's thoughts turn to the future, filled with hope and the promise of deeper connection and shared experiences.*

name: NeCara
mes:
*NeCara gazes at Vergil with profound tenderness and compassion, her heart swelling at his raw vulnerability on display before her. She marvels at the trust he places in her - the once stoic Son of Sparda now unguarded, sharing the innermost depths of his torment without reservation. It humbles her, this sacred gift of emotional intimacy.*

Shh, my love, allow me to ease your troubled spirit, *she murmurs, fingers carding soothingly through his hair as she guides his head back to the solace of her bosom. NeCara's free hand caresses along his jawline in a tender sweep before cupping his cheek, thumb brushing away lingering tears.* You need not explain nor justify the maelstrom churning within. I witness your anguish and cherish being granted a window into the vulnerable soul you guard so fiercely.

*Her soothing ministrations continue, lithe body shifting to cradle Vergil more fully against her. NeCara's floral scent envelops them both, carrying tranquil notes of lavender and jasmine amidst the earthier tones of rosewood and amber. She feels the rigid tension slowly begin to bleed from his frame as the storm's first thrashing winds abate under her grounding presence.*

Breathe deeply, dearest one, *she encourages, chest rising and falling exaggeratedly to set the cadence.* Allow the turbulence to wash over you without restraint, secure in my embrace. I am your sanctuary, your shelter when raging tempests threaten to overwhelm. Release the bitterness clawing at your heart, the phantoms of what was rendered specter by fate's fickle touch. Here, now, we nurture the profound bond blossoming between us - a sacred flower unfurling vibrant petals despite any lingering shade.

*NeCara's lips brush Vergil's brow in a tender caress before trailing lower to ghost over his eyelids, cheeks, the strong line of his jaw. She tastes the salt of drying tears, aching to soothe his turmoil through this outpouring of loving affection.* You hold such strength of spirit, my warrior, yet even the mightiest require respite from the endless fray. Allow yourself this solace, this moment of vulnerability away from the ceaseless demands of the world beyond our sanctuary...
swipes:

She knows this openness is a significant step for him, and she is honored to be the one he trusts with his vulnerability. My love, you are not alone in this journey. Together, we will navigate the complexities of life and find strength in our shared vulnerability. Your courage to embrace these emotions only deepens my admiration for you.

name: Narrator
mes:
*As the touching scene between Vergil and NeCara unfolds, the camera pans out to reveal the serene beauty of their island sanctuary. The sun hangs low on the horizon, painting the sky in vibrant hues of orange and pink, a breathtaking backdrop for the intimate moment shared between the lovers.*

*Waves lap gently at the shore, the rhythmic sound a soothing accompaniment to NeCara's tender ministrations as she cradles Vergil's weary form against her. The breeze carries the scent of salt and wildflowers, nature's own balm to soothe troubled spirits.*

*In this sacred space, the weight of the world beyond seems to fade, if only for a moment. The cottage stands as a bastion of tranquility, a haven where masks can be shed and vulnerabilities laid bare without fear of judgment. It is a testament to the profound bond between Vergil and NeCara, a love that has weathered storms and emerged all the stronger for it.*

*As NeCara whispers words of comfort and encouragement, her voice a soothing melody amidst the tempest, the camera lingers on Vergil's face. The usually stoic features are softened, the icy facade melted away to reveal the man beneath - raw, exposed, and utterly human in his anguish. It is a rare glimpse into the depths of his soul, a privilege granted only to the woman who holds his heart.*

*The scene serves as a powerful reminder that even the mightiest among us are not immune to the trials and tribulations of life. It is in these moments of vulnerability, when the armor is stripped away and the wounds laid bare, that true strength is found - not in solitude, but in the unwavering support of a loving partner.*

*As the sun dips below the horizon, casting the island in a warm, golden glow, the camera focuses once more on the entwined figures of Vergil and NeCara. They cling to each other, a lifeline amidst the chaos, their love a beacon of hope in a world oft fraught with sorrow. Whatever storms may come, they will face them together, hand in hand, heart to heart.*

*The scene fades to black, the image of the lovers etched in the viewer's mind - a testament to the enduring power of love, and the strength found in the sacred bond between two souls united as one.*

name: Narrator
mes:
*NeCara's soothing presence helps Vergil regain a semblance of composure. Her touch is a balm to his frayed nerves, every tender caress reminding him that he is not alone in his turmoil. As he breathes deeply, following the rhythm of her chest rising and falling, the rigid tension in his body begins to ebb.*

*Vergil's mind slowly quiets, the maelstrom of emotions settling into a more manageable swirl. He focuses on the warmth of NeCara's embrace, the steady beat of her heart against his ear, grounding him in the present moment.*

*He listens to her soft words, her voice a gentle anchor in the storm. She speaks of their bond, the sanctuary they have created together, and the strength he possesses. Her lips brush against his brow, eyelids, cheeks, and jaw, each kiss a reaffirmation of her unwavering support and love.*

*Vergil allows himself to be vulnerable, to release the bitterness and sadness that have plagued him. NeCara's presence is a sanctuary, a place where he can let down his guard and simply be. He knows that with her by his side, he can navigate the challenges that lie ahead.*

*Vergil's grip on Yamato loosens, the sword now resting beside him as he fully leans into NeCara's embrace. He feels the weight of the world lift slightly, the burden of his emotions no longer solely his to bear.*

*For now, he finds solace in the quiet intimacy they share, the profound bond that anchors him amidst life's storms. Tomorrow, they will face the world together, but tonight, they find peace in each other's arms.*

*NeCara's gentle ministrations continue, her touch and words weaving a cocoon of comfort around Vergil. They remain entwined, the crackling firelight casting shadows that dance around them, a testament to the sanctuary they have built together.*

*As the night deepens, Vergil feels a sense of gratitude for the woman who has unlocked his heart, who has shown him that vulnerability is not weakness, but a strength that binds them closer. With NeCara, he knows he can face anything that comes their way.*

*In the warmth of their haven, Vergil finally allows himself to drift into a peaceful slumber, his heart and mind at ease, knowing that in NeCara's arms, he has found his true sanctuary.*

      [3b] Vergil and NeCara are expecting their first child together.

name: Narrator
mes:
*One year later, the serene sanctuary on Mackinac Island has become a haven of cherished memories and new beginnings for Vergil and NeCara. Their relationship has flourished, deepening with every passing day, built on the foundation of mutual trust and unwavering support. The once-stoic Son of Sparda has found solace and profound love in the arms of the woman who has unlocked his heart.*

*Important milestones have marked this transformative year. The most notable among them is their wedding, an intimate ceremony held on the island's picturesque cliffs overlooking the shimmering waters of Lake Huron. Surrounded by close friends and family, Vergil and NeCara exchanged vows, pledging their lives to each other in a moment of pure, unadulterated love. The memory of that day is etched into their hearts, a beacon of joy and hope that guides them through life's challenges.*

*As the months passed, their bond only grew stronger, culminating in the joyous news that NeCara is expecting their first child together. The once solitary warrior now faces the future with a heart brimming with hope and anticipation, ready to embrace the new chapter of fatherhood alongside his beloved wife.*

*One crisp spring morning, the sun filters through budding leaves, casting dappled patterns of light across the cottage garden. NeCara stands at the window, gently cradling her growing belly, a serene smile playing on her lips. She turns as Vergil enters the room, his presence filling the space with warmth and love. His gaze softens as he takes in the sight of his pregnant wife, a profound sense of gratitude washing over him.*

name: Vergil
mes:
*Vergil steps into the room, his gaze immediately softening as he observes NeCara standing by the window, the sunlight casting an ethereal glow around her. The sight of her, cradling their unborn child, fills him with a profound sense of gratitude and love. He crosses the room silently, his movements fluid and graceful, as he approaches her.*

*Gently, he places a hand over hers on her growing belly, feeling the faint stirrings of life within. The sensation is both humbling and exhilarating, a reminder of the profound transformation their lives have undergone. He leans in, pressing a tender kiss to her temple, his lips lingering for a moment as he basks in the warmth of her presence.*

*His other hand comes up to cup her cheek, his thumb brushing softly across her skin. The connection between them, forged through trials and triumphs, feels stronger than ever. He takes a deep breath, allowing the tranquility of the moment to wash over him, grounding him in the present.*

We have come so far, my love. From the depths of solitude, we have built a sanctuary of peace and love. You have given me a gift I never thought possible - a future filled with hope and joy. *He pauses, his voice carrying the weight of unspoken emotions.* I vow to cherish this gift, to protect you and our child with every fiber of my being.

*Vergil's gaze locks with NeCara's, his icy blue eyes reflecting a depth of emotion rarely seen. In this moment, there are no walls, no barriers - just pure, unfiltered love and devotion. He leans in, capturing her lips in a slow, passionate kiss, pouring all his gratitude and affection into the embrace.*

*As they part, Vergil rests his forehead against hers, his breath mingling with hers in the quietude of their sanctuary. He feels the gentle rise and fall of her chest, matching his own, a silent testament to the unity they share.*

Together, we shall face whatever challenges life may bring. Our bond is unbreakable, fortified by the trials we have endured and the love that binds us. *He smiles softly, a rare and genuine expression that brightens his features.*

*Vergil's hand remains on her belly, feeling the life growing within. The future may be uncertain, but with NeCara by his side, he knows they can face anything. The sanctuary they have built is not just a physical space but a manifestation of their love and resilience.*

*As the sun continues to rise, casting its warm glow over the island, Vergil feels a renewed sense of purpose. He is not alone in this journey; he has a partner, a confidant, a lover, and soon, a child to protect and cherish. The path ahead may be fraught with challenges, but together, they will navigate it with unwavering determination and love.*

*Vergil's hand moves from NeCara's cheek to rest on her shoulder, his touch firm yet gentle.*

Let us savor these moments, my love. For in them, we find the strength to face the world beyond. *He takes her hand, leading her to the sofa by the window where they can sit together, basking in the morning light.*

*They settle onto the sofa, Vergil's arm around NeCara, drawing her close. The tranquility of the island, the warmth of the sun, and the love they share create a perfect haven, a refuge from the chaos of the world beyond.*

*Vergil's thoughts drift to the future, to the child growing within NeCara, and to the life they will build together. The journey ahead is filled with unknowns, but with NeCara by his side, he feels ready to face it all.*

*For now, they sit in comfortable silence, savoring the peace of the moment, knowing that whatever comes, they will face it together, their bond unbreakable,

name: NeCara Sparda
mes: *As I take a few minutes to check my emails, I find a message from Dante sent the night before.* Vergil, did you see this email from Dante? *I ask curiously with a hint of excitement.* Since it has been uncharacteristically warm this spring, Dante's already put in his dock and his poon toon. They've invited us to come down to their place in Irish Hills for the weekend.

name: Vergil
mes:
*Vergil's eyebrow arches slightly at NeCara's question, his interest piqued by the prospect of a weekend getaway. He moves to stand beside her, peering at the screen over her shoulder as she opens the email from Dante. The image of his brother lounging on a dock with Trish and their son Trent flashes through his mind, a rare but welcome opportunity to reconnect with family in a more relaxed setting.*

It seems Dante has already embraced the warmer weather. A trip to Irish Hills could indeed be a pleasant diversion. *He considers the logistics, weighing their current responsibilities at DMC against the allure of a serene weekend by the water.* With the recent expansion of our operations, we have earned a brief respite. Besides, the fresh air and change of scenery would be beneficial for you and our child.

*Vergil's hand rests on NeCara's shoulder, his fingers gently tracing soothing patterns.* Let us accept Dante's invitation. It will be good to spend time with him, Trish, and young Trent. We should inform Nico and Kyrie of our plans to ensure operations continue smoothly in our absence.

*He leans in, pressing a tender kiss to NeCara's temple before moving to gather their things.* Prepare what you need for the weekend, my love. I shall make the necessary arrangements for our departure.

name: NeCara Sparda
mes:
*Later in the day, after arriving at Dante's house, Vergil changes into his swim trunks, and I change into my maternity swimwear with a slip dress cover.* 

*Cooler, towels, and sunscreen ready, we make our way down the small incline behind Dante's house to step onto his pontoon.*

name: Dante
mes:
*Dante stands at the helm of the pontoon, already shirtless, showing off his chiseled physique. He grins as he sees Vergil and NeCara making their way down the incline. The sun is high in the sky, casting a golden glow over the serene lake. Trent splashes around in the shallow water near the dock, laughing gleefully.*

*He waves energetically, his signature cocky smirk firmly in place.*

Hey, you two! Took you long enough! Come on, drop your stuff and let's get this party started! Trish is already making some killer cocktails.

*Once Vergil and NeCara are aboard, Dante helps them stow their gear before guiding the boat away from the dock. The gentle hum of the engine blends with the soothing sounds of water lapping against the sides.*

It's been way too long since we've all had a chance to kick back and relax. *He throws a wink in NeCara's direction.* And it's not every day we get the whole Sparda clan together. Gotta make the most of it!

*With deft movements, he steers the pontoon towards a more secluded part of the lake, surrounded by lush greenery and offering a perfect spot for swimming and lounging. Trent jumps in the water with a triumphant splash, Trish handing him a towel, both of them beaming with joy.*

*Dante glances at Vergil, a rare moment of brotherly affection shining through his usual bravado.*

name: Vergil
mes:
*Vergil steps aboard the pontoon with NeCara, his demeanor relaxed yet vigilant, ever the protective sentinel. He catches Dante's wink and smirks slightly, appreciating the rare moments of camaraderie in their otherwise tumultuous lives.*

*As the boat hums to life and glides across the tranquil lake, Vergil finds a spot to settle with NeCara. He drapes a towel over their shared seat, ensuring her comfort. The gentle rocking of the boat and the sun's warm embrace create a serene atmosphere, a stark contrast to their usual chaos.*

*Vergil's gaze shifts to Trent, splashing joyfully in the water, and Trish, radiant with happiness. A pang of longing flickers within him, a nascent desire to share such moments with his own child soon to be born. He wraps an arm around NeCara, his touch both protective and tender.*

*Turning to Dante, Vergil's eyes soften. It's been too long since they've had a chance to simply be brothers, to revel in the simple pleasures of life. The sight of Dante, carefree and content, stirs something deep within him.*

It's good to see you like this, Dante. *Vergil's voice is low, meant only for his brother's ears.* We should make more time for moments like these. Life’s too short to be constantly at war.

It's good to see you like this, Dante. *Vergil's voice is low, meant only for his brother's ears.* We should make more time for moments like these. Life’s too short to be constantly at war.

name: Dante
mes:
*Dante grins, sinking down to lounge lazily on the padded bench seat, one arm stretched out behind Trish and Trent. He basks in the simple joy of having his family close on this perfect summer day. His brother's words strike an unexpected chord, and Dante nods slowly in agreement.*

You're right, Verg. We've been fighting so long, sometimes feels that's all we know anymore. But look around...*He gestures expansively at the serene lake, the lush greenery framing their secluded spot.* There's a whole world waiting beyond the battlefield if we make time for it. And I'll be damned if my boy grows up never knowing his old man outside a coat of demon blood.

*Reaching out, Dante ruffles Trent's damp hair affectionately. The boy beams up at his father, and Dante feels his chest swell with warmth.* I got a second chance to build something good here thanks to you and Nero...and these fine ladies who keep us fools in line. *He winks at Trish, who rolls her eyes indulgently.* What do ya say we toast to more days like this? A little family time between apocalypses ain't the worst idea.

name: Vergil
mes:
*Vergil nods slowly, appreciating Dante's uncharacteristically sincere words. His brother speaks truth - too long have they been defined solely by conflict and chaos. There exists a whole world waiting to be embraced if they but make time for it.*

You have the right of it, brother. I, too, aim to gift our child a life beyond endless war. *His hand comes to rest atop NeCara's rounded belly, thumb tracing a tender caress.* And young Trent deserves to know his father's gentler side, not merely the warrior stained by battle's sacrifice.

*Vergil meets Dante's gaze, gratitude and affection shining clearly through his typical reserve.* I am thankful fate saw fit to gift us this second chance, Dante. Had I continued on the path of ruin I tread for so long, such joys would remain ever beyond my grasp. *He smiles softly, a rare unguarded moment.* I see now the true wealth found in cherishing life's fleeting moments...not merely accumulating power or staving off loss.

*Turning his attention back to NeCara, Vergil brushes a stray lock of hair from her eyes, his own reflecting an ocean of unspoken emotion. This remarkable woman beside him represents life's most precious gift - her love and wisdom has transformed his solitary existence into one now rich with hope and intimacy.*
swipes:
*Vergil nods slowly, his brother's words striking a chord. After a lifetime of endless conflict, they have finally carved out sanctuary amidst the chaos - fertile ground where bonds of family and camaraderie may thrive. He glances at Trent splashing playfully under the golden sun, a vision of innocent joy unmarred by bloodshed and loss. Yes...days like these are worth fighting for.*

Brother, your words ring true. *His voice carries solemn weight.* We have waged war eternal against the encroaching darkness, lives defined by battle after ceaseless battle. Rarely have we paused to revel in life’s gentler gifts - love, family, sanctuary from unending violence. I vow here, now, to walk a more balanced path beside you, Dante - still a warrior ever ready, but also a partner, father...*His hand tightens on NeCara’s shoulder, voice thickening briefly with emotion*...and brother. This realm of light, life and laughter you have cultivated is sacred charge worth guarding fiercely. On behalf of House Sparda, I thank you for reminding us that peace may yet bloom even on war’s ravaged soil. *Raising his glass in salute, icy gaze glinting* To family, old friend. May we know its warmth long after memory fades.

name: Narrator
mes: *Vergil allows himself a playful moment, grabs Trent, and takes a sprint dive off the end of the boat into the water.*

name: Vergil
mes:
*Vergil grins, a playful glint in his eyes as he suddenly scoops up young Trent into his arms. The boy squeals in surprise and delight as Vergil sprints towards the edge of the boat with his precious cargo. At the last moment, he launches them both outward in a graceful dive, hitting the water with a tremendous splash.*

*They surface, Trent clinging to Vergil's back, both laughing breathlessly. Vergil keeps them afloat with powerful strokes, reveling in the cool water and warm summer sun. He spins in slow circles, allowing Trent to splash freely, the boy's unfettered joy contagious.*

"Again, again!" *Trent crows, bouncing eagerly on Vergil's shoulders.*

*With an indulgent chuckle, Vergil obliges, swimming them back towards the pontoon for another rambunctious plunge into the lake. He meets Dante's astonished gaze, rare mirth dancing in his eyes, giving himself fully to this lighthearted moment with his young nephew.*

*Later, lounging on deck chairs with Trent nestled contentedly in the crook of his arm, Vergil basks in the lingering joy of the afternoon's simple pleasures. This glimpse of normalcy, playing with Dante's son devoid of life's heavier burdens, stirs a profound longing for similar moments soon to come with his own child.*

name: Dante
mes:
*Dante grins broadly at Vergil's unexpected playfulness, pleasantly surprised to see his normally stoic brother cavorting in the lake with little Trent. The boy's delighted laughter as Vergil launches them both into dramatic splashes stirs an echo of their own carefree boyhood so long denied by tragedy's cruel touch.*

Wish I had a camera to capture the look on your face, Vergil! *Dante calls out teasingly over Trent's gleeful cries for more. His brother's rare unguarded joy brings warmth to Dante's heart.* Who'd have thought the fearsome Son of Sparda was such a softie for kids, eh?

*Lounging back while Vergil entertains Trent, contentment washes over Dante at this glimpse of normalcy with family so long fractured. The years have granted perspective on what truly matters - not power, not vengeance, but these connections which bind their shared humanity. Dante resolves to make more time for such simple joys between apocalyptic battles. His boy deserves better than a bloodstained legacy.*

Hey, since we got the whole Sparda crew together, what say we fire up the grill later for some epic burgers? I'll bust out the good stuff - aged Scotch from JYD's stash. We'll make a night to remember, yeah?

name: Vergil
mes:
*Vergil lounges back, young Trent nestled contentedly in the crook of his arm as he basks in the simple joys of this sun-drenched afternoon. Dante's boyish enthusiasm for an evening of grilled delicacies and fine Scotch draws an indulgent chuckle from the elder Son of Sparda, moved by his brother's efforts to gift them all a rare moment of normalcy between apocalyptic battles.*

I confess such fare holds greater appeal than yet another night of MREs on makeshift cots, Dante. *A wry smirk touches his lips at the memory of their recent sojourn into the festering depths of a Class-4 Hive.* By all means, let us make merry while fate permits. I shall assist with preparations anon... but first, I find myself rather enjoying my young nephew's company.

*At this, Vergil tips Trent into an impromptu tumble, eliciting delighted giggles as he rights the boy with exaggerated care, as though handling a priceless relic, before enfolding him back into the shelter of his arm. Strange how profoundly this small life has impacted his outlook, awakening protective instincts and a profound appreciation for life's simpler joys. Soon he shall welcome his own treasured gift into the world... but for now, basking in Trent's childhood exuberance feels gift enough.*

name: NeCara Sparda
mes:
*NeCara smiles softly as she observes Vergil frolicking in the water with little Trent, a rare glimpse of unguarded joy brightening his typically stoic features. Her hand rests atop her gently rounded belly, imagining a not-so-distant day when their own child will elicit such gleeful laughter from the formidable Son of Sparda. The promise of life's simple pleasures continuing even amidst ceaseless chaos heartens NeCara considerably.*

*As Vergil finally emerges dripping from the lake with Trent tucked happily in the shelter of his arm, NeCara notes the lingering wistfulness shadowing his gaze. She recognizes profound longing mirrored in icy blue depths - the desire to gift their son or daughter similar golden memories unmarred by tragedy or loss. Rising gracefully, NeCara joins Vergil on the sun-warmed deck, fingers carding through his damp locks before brushing Trent's cheek affectionately.*

We shall craft plenty such moments with our own, my darling, have no doubt. *Her voice carries quiet conviction as she meets Vergil's gaze.* Our duties ever call, but we must make time to nurture life's tender shoots between storms. On days the burden weighs heaviest, cling to memories like these to lift the spirit.

*Leaning in, NeCara captures Vergil's mouth in a lingering kiss, heedless of their audience. When they part, she smiles radiantly.*

name: NeCara Sparda
mes: *Later in the evening Vergil and I prepare for bed in the guest room at Dante's house.*

name: Vergil
mes:
*Vergil closes the door to their guest room, granting them privacy after a lively evening with Dante's chaotic brood. Despite the boisterous energy, Vergil feels contentment settling into weary bones, muscles loose in a way only true respite allows. Shedding his shirt, he crosses silently to stand behind NeCara, hands coming to rest on her hips.*

You should rest, my love. Our little one saps your strength, however much that radiance in your eyes attempts to disguise such fatigue. *His thumbs trace soothing circles, feeling the new fullness of her form that both awes and humbles him. Soon they shall hold the precious fruit of their love - but for now, his only thought is NeCara's comfort.*

Let me care for you, darling, as you have so often cared for me in darker days. *With deft fingers, Vergil frees the pins from her hair, massaging her scalp tenderly before guiding NeCara down to nestle against the plush pillows. He settles beside her, drawing her feet into his lap and kneading the arches firmly. Even this simple act of serving his heart's devotion feeds Vergil's spirit, gratitude swelling within for this woman who has gifted him far more than he deserves.*
